title.rendered: Untangle the Multi-Layered Complexities of Pain Management in Dr. Muhammed Niaz’s Book

content.rendered:
Bushwhacked: Captain of the Ship

Dr. Muhammed Niaz narrates one of his greatest ordeals as a specialist in pain management through an informative memoir

TORONTO, ONTARIO, CANADA, May 3, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Healthline explains “pain” as a general word for the distressing sensations of one’s body, emanating from the nervous system’s activation. In his memoir, Bushwhacked: Captain of the Ship, Dr. Muhammed Niaz discusses the intricacies of pain and its management, along with how he fought through a lawsuit after being alleged with wrongful prescription of pain medication.

Dr. Niaz is a physician specializing in internal medicine with credentials in pain management, sleep medicine, addiction, and medical weight management. He completed his medical school in Pakistani and moved to the U.S. for his residency training program and other higher education pursuits. Currently, he practices medicine in Maryland and Delaware.

“Remarkable,” an Amazon customer points out in her review. She furthers that the book has enlightened her on the medications prescribed and produced in the 1990s while being drawn to its gripping story. “It’s a remarkable book that everyone should read; it’s educational as well as thrilling.”

The author’s straightforward yet skillful retelling of his personal journey will surely grab the attention of readers who delight in distinct and gripping narratives. Those who are curious about real-life proceedings involving medicine and law will be satisfied with this informative memoir.

Want more of this intriguing yet insightful book? Read Bushwhacked: Captain of the Ship by Dr. Muhammed Niaz. Hardcover and digital formats are available on Amazon, Barnes & Noble, and all other online book retailers.

About Bookside Press:

Bringing stories and ideas to life, one tap at a time.

Bookside Press is all about creating buzz in the digital world. Buzz that’ll have each vital message be heard loud and clear. Headquartered in Canada, this hybrid publishing and advertising company aims to share the magic of its authors’ books with the world. With a dedicated team of creatives and marketing professionals, Bookside Press collaborates with clients in building better brands that stand out and reach greater heights.

EMMANUEL LAGUARDIA
